summary: A corporate executive is taken prisoner by an underground organization known as The Movement, and is turned over to a ruthless interrogator.
cast: Stephen Markle|Don Francks|Stan Wilson|David Clement|Gail Dahms-Bonine|Michèle Chicoine|William Binney|Jay Macdonald|George Murray|Ken Lemaire|Madeleine Atkinson|Andrew Foot|Andy Adoch|Ed Valiunas|Keith McClean|Robert Everton|John Paul Young|Robert A. Silverman|Chris Lumiere|Barry Edmondson|Richard Hardy|Nuke Yee|Morgan Jones|Philip Rowly|Bill Edwards|George Hevenor|William Goodswan|John Jurens|Leigh Booth
title: 984: Prisoner of the Future
